meanings.definition: A device used to protect electrical circuits from excessive voltage spikes.
meanings.sent1: The varistors in the surge protector helped prevent damage to my computer during the lightning storm.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check if the surge protector has varistors to keep your electronics safe.
meanings.sent3: The varistors in the surge protector were like tiny superheroes, ready to save the day from voltage spikes.
meanings.sent4: Her quick reflexes were like varistors, protecting her from the sudden surge of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The varistors acted as shields, guarding the delicate circuits from harmful voltage spikes.

meanings.definition: Varistors are commonly used in surge protectors to prevent damage to electronic devices.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to buy surge protectors with varistors for added safety.
meanings.sent2: The varistors in the surge protector absorbed the excess voltage, keeping the TV safe.
meanings.sent3: The varistors in the surge protector were like little guardians, watching over the electronic devices.
meanings.sent4: His ability to stay calm under pressure was like varistors, protecting him from the chaos around him.
meanings.sent5: The varistors functioned like safety nets, ensuring the electronic devices were shielded from harm.
